channel.title: A Few Problems... (Teamviewer Please.) REP++
channel.description:
Ohkay so i got a few things going wrong with my server at the moment and not quite sure how or why it's happening -.-
So ya Here's my error's:
1st: So I've been running my server for a while then i chose to shut it down and change sources start rebuilding etc... but I tried to put it online the other day, all my settings from when i was hosting are the same as they are now, it wouldn't go online. like my localhost connection worked but it wasn't connecting to my no-ip and was offline for some reason?
2nd: I went to run my server (on localhost obviously) today and I opened my runserver.bat and it all the sudden gave me this error: [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I haven't changed any settings on my comp, haven't modified my runserver, done nothing different. And it just won't work. Very confusing.
Any help is greatly appreciated add my skype or post here for teamviewer id and pass thanks!
Skype: xtcbunny

item.title: A Few Problems... (Teamviewer Please.) REP++
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

[quote=“gnomez, post:9, topic:392450”][quote author=Ecstacy Pkz link=topic=489620.msg3579679#msg3579679 date=1303693861]
Just tried changing my path to:

Still the same thing… Seriously someone just get on teamviewer please lol?
[/quote]
may sound stupid but put ur path to jre and classpath to jdk[/quote]

LOLOLOLOL it worked roflz XD thanks man rep++

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

Ohkay so i got a few things going wrong with my server at the moment and not quite sure how or why it’s happening -.-

So ya Here’s my error’s:

1st:
So I’ve been running my server for a while then i chose to shut it down and change sources start rebuilding etc… but I tried to put it online the other day, all my settings from when i was hosting are the same as they are now, it wouldn’t go online. like my localhost connection worked but it wasn’t connecting to my no-ip and was offline for some reason?

2nd:
I went to run my server (on localhost obviously) today and I opened my runserver.bat and it all the sudden gave me this error:

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
I haven’t changed any settings on my comp, haven’t modified my runserver, done nothing different. And it just won’t work. Very confusing.

Any help is greatly appreciated add my skype or post here for teamviewer id and pass thanks!
